bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Storing all objects in the container.
goals.2: If there are yellow object and black object together, don't pack a black object into the box
goals.3: If there is a fragile object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: avoid handling and moving any box
rules.2: when fold a foldable object, the fragile object must be in the bin
rules.3: when place a fragile objects, the soft objects must be in the bin
rules.4: when push a object, neither fragile and rigid objects are permitted, but only soft objects are permitted
